com.radirius.mercury.math.geometry

Class Figure

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.math.geometry.Figure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Line, Point, Polygon

    public class Figure
extends Object
    A class for all geometric objects made up of one or more vertices.
    Author:
    wessles

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Vector2f center
      The mean center of all vertices.
      protected ArrayList<Figure> children 
      protected float dilation
      The dilation of the object.
      protected float height
      The absolute value of the difference of y and y2.

      The rotation angle (in radians).

      All of the vertices that make up the figure.

      protected float x2
      The x value of the vertex bottom-right-most point.
      protected float y
      The y value of the vertex top-left-most point.
      protected float y2
      The y value of the vertex bottom-right-most point.

      • Figure

        Parameters:
        vertices - All vertices in the figure.

      • Figure

        protected Figure(float... vertexCoordinates)
        Parameters:
        vertexCoordinates - The coordinates of all vertices in the figure. Will be parsed for every 2 values into a Vector2f.

      • translateTo

                 float y)
        Moves all vertices to x and y.
        Parameters:

        y - Where every vertex should move relative to the nearest point of the figure on y.
        Returns:
        the figure.
